groups.name: variables
groups.visibleRule: command = validate || command = plan || command = apply

inputs.name: workingDirectory
inputs.label: Configuration Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Terraform configuration directory. If empty, the root of the repository (build) or artifacts (release) is used, which is $(System.DefaultWorkingDirectory)

inputs.name: environmentServiceName
inputs.label: Environment Azure Subscription
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select an Azure resource manager subscription for the deployment

inputs.name: secureVarsFile
inputs.label: Secured Variables File (Secrets)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Pick a terraform vars file from Azure DevOps Secure Files. This should be option should be used for terraform variable files that contain secrets.

inputs.name: workingDirectory
inputs.label: Working Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Current working directory where the command is run. If empty, the root of the repository (build) or artifacts (release) is used, which is $(System.DefaultWorkingDirectory)

inputs.name: commandOptions
inputs.label: Command Options
inputs.helpMarkDown: Any additional options for the selected command such as `-input=true`. Multiple options can be provided delimited by spaces as `-option1=value -option2=value -option3=value`

inputs.name: backendType
inputs.label: Backend Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the terraform backend type to use.

inputs.name: backendServiceArm
inputs.label: Backend Azure Subscription
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select an Azure resource manager subscription for the terraform backend configuration

inputs.name: backendAzureRmResourceGroupName
inputs.label: Resource Group Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The resource group which contains the storage account.

inputs.name: backendAzureRmStorageAccountName
inputs.label: Storage Account Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the storage account.

inputs.name: backendAzureRmContainerName
inputs.label: Container Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the container to use within the storage account.

inputs.name: backendAzureRmKey
inputs.label: Key
inputs.helpMarkDown: The key where to place/look for state file inside the container
